2025-12-05HCControlled Drugs and Substances ActRegulations Amending the Precursor Control Regulations (Increased Regulatory Oversight) Regulations Amending the Precursor Control Regulations (Increased Regulatory Oversight) in order to (1) increase regulatory oversight through mandatory reporting of suspicious transactions involving precursors; (2) mitigate the risk of employees diverting precursors to an illicit market or use by requiring licensed dealers to take reasonable measures to prevent this potential occurrence; (3) expand condition-of-sale restrictions for certain health products containing ephedrine and/or pseudoephedrine; and (4) enable the Minister of Health to add conditions to a licence or registration at any time, to add conditions to transit and transshipment permits at the time of issuance and to partially suspend a licence or registration.Registration: SOR/2025-0260 Publication Date: 2025-12-17
subject: Regulations Amending the Precursor Control Regulations (Increased Regulatory Oversight)
precis: Regulations Amending the Precursor Control Regulations (Increased Regulatory Oversight) in order to (1) increase regulatory oversight through mandatory reporting of suspicious transactions involving precursors; (2) mitigate the risk of employees diverting precursors to an illicit market or use by requiring licensed dealers to take reasonable measures to prevent this potential occurrence; (3) expand condition-of-sale restrictions for certain health products containing ephedrine and/or pseudoephedrine; and (4) enable the Minister of Health to add conditions to a licence or registration at any time, to add conditions to transit and transshipment permits at the time of issuance and to partially suspend a licence or registration.
